column4: I need a way to back up my mother's extenive (2000+) outlook 2007 contacts so that they can be imported ACCURATELY into either evolution or thunderbird, so I can wipe her computer, install ubuntu, and not have to deal with latenight phonecalls. Is anyone familiar with doing thi?
i'd look at what imports both support, one may support WAB files and you can import easily
install ssh and setup port forwarding too so you can connect from miles away and fix stuff :)
